column4: Hello, I have a problem when trying to load the Ubuntu Live CD on one of my XP machines. When I reboot the system I get a message saying "Verifying DMI Data Pool.... Boot from CD:  ISOLINUX 3.11 Debian-2066-03-16 Copyright (c) 1994-2005 isolinux: Disk error 32, AX=4280,drive 9f Boot failed: press a key to retry.
Someone please IM if they got an answer
sorry to say but your cd is corrupt
